functions.name: gmail_send_tls_connection_enabled
functions.description: Checks if Gmail send TLS connection is enabled in Datastream.

functions.name: dms_connection_profiles_non_public
functions.description: Checks if DMS connection profiles are non-public in Datastream.

functions.name: streaming_connection_idle_timeout_set
functions.description: Checks if streaming connection idle timeout is set in Datastream.

functions.name: dms_connections_ssl_configured
functions.description: Checks if DMS connections have SSL configured in Datastream.

notes: All functions are based on GCP DATASTREAM API.
Ensure proper IAM permissions are configured.
Consider regional vs global service differences.
Implement appropriate retry logic for API calls.
